titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on certain internal combustion, 2-stroke-cycle, piston-type engines.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the suspension of duty, through December 31, 1992, on certain two-stroke cycle piston engines to be installed in vehicles designed for snow travel, golf carts, and nonamphibious all-terrain vehicles designed to carry one passenger.
